item.title: Change DeployStudio Wallpaper
item.description: I have been doing quite a bit of Mac OS X Image work lately and have found DeployStudio to be THE best FREE and easy to customise solution for doing this. One thing i wanted to do was change the default wallpaper for the DeployStudioRuntime.nbi that is created and used as a windows Pre Environment equivalent. I achieved this by going into the DeployStudioRuntime.nbi folder located on the server at:
